  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from racking in warehouse, forklift operator punctured a drum with the forkblades on his forklift contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was neutralized and cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured drum.
